3: Luna is standing alone in the entrance of the Venus Splash Park, looking at the beach. Gradually, she opens her mouth.
What is it?
As if on cue, Roland hops down from a nearby building. His once-damaged frame seems to have been perfunctorily repaired.
Should we deal with the Babylonians next? I am ready always.
Unnecessary. We have achieved our purpose.
Babylonia playing sleuth here is just helping us clean up.
They provide a good laugh, so let them be. Let them amuse us.
Very well...
While the two are talking, Alpha connects in.
I'm almost there.
Later than expected, hm?
Roland can see Alpha frowning slightly through the holographic screen.
Just ran into some trouble on the way over.
No matter. I'll wait for you at the beach.
Sure.
Luna disconnects and turns to look at Roland.
Gabriel is almost finished on his end. Go meet him.
Roger.
With that, Luna leaves, heading to her agreed location with Alpha. Roland, for some reason, is standing still.
Miss Luna's expression... Is it just me?
...She's been acting quite strange today.
